src_original: ya 2 asama samantāva bhāsasphuṭeraṇa gati gagaṇa svabhāva viśuddha uṣṇīva vijayā pariśriddhe ||

abhiṣiñuntumāṁ sarvva tathāgitāḥ sugatavaravacanāmṛtā bhiṣake mahāmantapadaḥ | ya |  om sāḥhara āyuḥ saṁdhyāraṇī śodhaya 2 viśodhaya 2 gagaṇa svabhāva viśuddhe uṣṇīṣa vijayā pari śuddha saha mraraśmi saṁcāditā sarvva tathāgatā valokinī ||
vaja kāya saṁhatana pariśuddhe |  sarvva karmmā vaśṇaviśuddhe ||
